Otk.welcomeText:
Welcome to the VDI 2770 Open Toolkit plusmeta GmbH. Create digital manufacturer information in just a few steps in accordance with the VDI 2770 and take advantage of the Digital data chain.

The VDI 2770 Open Toolkit can be used free of charge and without registration.
Information about your organization will be sent to plusmeta GmbH for product information purposes and stored locally in your browser. All other data and documents are not stored or transmitted. After updating your browser, this data is no longer available.
Otk.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the VDI 2770 Open Toolkit!

Public.guidelines: The following guidelines were defined by the creator of this project.
